professional_summary: Senior DevOps Engineer | Cloud Platform Engineer | SRE with 3+ years of expertise in cloud infrastructure, CI/CD automation, and container orchestration. Specialized in GitOps, DevSecOps, and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices. Proven track record of scaling distributed systems and reducing deployment times by 70%+. Seeking to leverage AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform expertise in a senior technical role.

work_experience.title: DevOps Engineer
bullets: Architected and implemented comprehensive CI/CD pipelines using GitLab CI and Jenkins, reducing deployment cycles by 70% and enabling daily releases
Managed multi-region AWS infrastructure supporting 100+ microservices with Terraform and Ansible, achieving 99.99% uptime
Implemented GitOps practices using ArgoCD and Flux, automating infrastructure changes and reducing human error by 85%
Designed and deployed monitoring solutions with Prometheus and Grafana, reducing incident response time by 60%
Led migration of monolithic applications to containerized Kubernetes clusters, improving resource utilization by 45%

work_experience.title: Cloud Engineer
bullets: Scaled cloud infrastructure from 10 to 100+ cities using AWS and Terraform, supporting 1M+ active users
Developed automated deployment workflows reducing release cycles from 2 days to 4 hours
Implemented comprehensive monitoring using Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK Stack, achieving 99.95% uptime SLA
Optimized AWS costs by 35% through rightsizing, reserved instances, and automated resource cleanup
Built disaster recovery procedures and automated backup systems, reducing RTO from 4 hours to 30 minutes

education.degree: Master of Science - Cloud Computing & Cybersecurity

skills.Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, CloudFormation), Azure (VMs, Functions, DevOps), GCP (Compute Engine, Cloud Storage)
skills.Containers & Orchestration: Docker, Kubernetes, Docker Compose, Helm, AWS EKS, Azure AKS
skills.CI/CD & Automation: Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, ArgoCD, Flux
skills.Monitoring & Observability: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana), Datadog, New Relic
skills.Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, GitOps, DevSecOps, SRE, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Observability

projects.name: Multi-Region Kubernetes Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented multi-region Kubernetes platform supporting 100+ microservices with automated failover, achieving 99.99% uptime and reducing deployment time by 80%

projects.name: GitOps Automation Framework
projects.description: Developed automated GitOps framework for infrastructure and application deployments, reducing manual intervention by 90% and deployment errors by 85%
